text:
Question 95) Duerme bold duer, duer, bold, that you are in the field, bold ...
You will bring quails to you. You will bring rich fruit to you. You will bring you the bristle meat to you. You will bring muchas cosas to you [...] duer, duer, bold, that you are in the field, bold ... working, working hard, working on itself. Working y at Le Pagan, working itself. Duerme bold is a lullaby of Hispanic popular culture, whose letter problematizes a social issue,
A) Highlight the woman's pride as a home provider.
B) highlight the mother's affective absence in the creation of the FI.
C) portray the precariousness of labor relations in the countryside.
D) highlight the insertion of women in the rural labor market.
E) Lirically exalt the maternal voice in the citizen formation of the fi. Questions from 96 to 135
